Detailed Description

Class to model cmd, address and data buses of a DRAM.

Description: This class just acts a wrapper around the data and cmd buses of all the channels. It contains the array of both cmd and data bus handlers. It is not used during normal MC & DRAM operations but only used to set up some links between the busses and other components in the beginning
